mapper.select: SELECT SUM(TSB.BOOK_PEOPLE_NO) bookPeopleNo, TSB.PLAY_DATE playDate FROM TB_SHIPPING_BOOK TSB LEFT JOIN TB_SHIPPING_CANCEL TSC ON(TSB.BOOK_NO = TSC.BOOK_NO) WHERE TSC.BOOK_NO IS NULL AND TSB.PLAY_DATE > SYSDATE AND TSB.SHIPPING_NO = #{shippingNo} GROUP BY TSB.PLAY_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SHIPPING_BOOK ( BOOK_NO, SHIPPING_NO, USER_NO, BOOK_PEOPLE_NO, PLAY_DATE, BOOK_CONTENT ) VALUES ( TO_CHAR('B'||SEQ_BOOK_NO.NEXTVAL), #{shippingNo}, #{userNo}, #{inPeople}, TO_DATE(#{playDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{bookContent} )
